name: Yet Another Pong (KennyTheBard)
description:
I don't assume any credit or copyright for this game idea. The purpose of this project is oply to help me get better at using Godot for my projects.

This game comes with 2 singleplayer modes (Against Computer and Training) and 2 multiplayer modes (Local and Online).
In order to play this game in online multiplayer, you must know the IP and port of the player that host the game.
